summary.span: 为列关联提供程序提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for column-association providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关联程序必须扩展此类。Association providers must extend this class.

summary.span: 获取或设置关联的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the association.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关联包括一对一、 1 对多和多对多。Associations include one-to-one, one-to-many, and many-to-many.
